articles.title: Delta surge halts Asia's travel bubbles even before they begin - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (Bloomberg): Fresh lockdowns and restrictions in Asia brought on by the faster-spreading Delta coronavirus variant are making the region’s pursuit of travel bubbles look like an increasingly fruitless endeavour.
